Web Export to HTML :: DynamicJasperHelper.exportToHtml(...) generates and sets up everything for a clean web html response.

Tests enhancements :: To ensure product quality, the following technologies had been added to the automated tests: * HSQL DB: for real JDBC and SQL report tests * Hibernate: HQL report test * HTTP Unit: to test Webwork result type. Also enabling future testing to new http facilities.
WebWork integration :: Fixed bug that had this feature broken. Also added new options to result type. Updated documentation (see "Integrate DynamicJasper with Webwork").

Custom Expressions :: Now variables also available in Custom Expression. Instead of implementing CustomExpression, use DJCustomExpression which already provides as parameter one map per family (fields, variables and parameters)
Report Name :: Report name can now be specified (dynamicReport.setReportName(...) ). When exporting to Excel, this name will be used as the sheet name
Report Properties :: Now the DynamicReport has a setProperty(String, String) method which passes the properties to the JasperReportDesign.
Page Orientation :: Orientation is working now

Field Properties Refactor :: Only PropertyColumn and its children are worthless to have field properties
